body.name: Native 1080P Projector,Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, 12000 Lumens Outdoor Portable Mini Video Movie Projector, Proyector Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/USB for Home Theater
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 40 mins
features: 【Wireless connectivity】: Easily mirror content from your favorite apps with a WiFi connection to the Internet. Bluetooth allows you to connect external speakers to enhance the audio experience. The projector has inner stereo speakers, but if you pursue for better sound effect, you can connect earphone or speaker to the projector though bluetooth.

【Native 1080P Full HD Resolution】: The projector is an excellent device that allows you to watch HD movies, with 1920*1080 native resolution, excellent 12000L brightness, and 10000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio, 200-inch screen with our projector for a truly brighter, and richer images! in the comfort of your own home,providing immersive movie experience Sharper

【Enhanced audio performance】: Immerse yourself in crystal clear sound with the built-in 15W speaker. Experience enhanced audio quality and enjoy your favorite movies, music and games in rich, immersive sound!

【Multiple Devices Compatible Projector 】Our portable movie projector is fit for watch videos, photo sharing, football matches, play games, etc. It can be perfectly connected with TV Stick, iphone, android phone, Tablet, Laptop, audio, PC, USB Flash Disk, PS4, Gaming Consoles, etc. (Please note that due to copyright issue, you may need to use an HDMI cable to connect your laptop for screen mirroring services like Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, and others.)

【Dedicated customer support】: We are committed to providing excellent customer service. Our knowledgeable and friendly support team is ready to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. We offer reliable after-sales service to give you peace of mind.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 26 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for summer movies!
reviews.reviewText: The versatility of this projector is great. Easy to use with smart phone, laptop, DVD player or flash drive, we tested those options and all were great. From music videos to a slide show of photos and a movie originating from the DVD player I love the versatility of this projector. Can't wait for summer to use the projector for outdoor movie nights! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars suitable for outdoor and home entertainment use
reviews.reviewText: The powerful features of the projector have provided me with an excellent audiovisual experience in my home theater. Whether through WiFi or Bluetooth, the connection is very convenient, eliminating the hassle of cables. The 12000 lumens brightness makes outdoor projections equally impressive, and the 1080P native resolution brings higher clarity to the images, it is a feature-rich, high-performance projection tool, especially suitable for outdoor and home entertainment use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars making it a cost-effective projector.
reviews.reviewText: The various connection options of the projector make it suitable for a wide range of devices, from iOS and Android to TV Stick, HDMI, and USB. Regardless of the device you use, easy connectivity is ensured. In outdoor environments, the brightness of 12000 lumens ensures a clear projection visible, adding more fun to outdoor activities. The support for 1080P resolution enhances image detail and color richness, making it a cost-effective projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars one of the best choices.
reviews.reviewText: The WiFi and Bluetooth features of the projector indeed make the connection more convenient, eliminating the cumbersome wired connections for a seamless user experience. With a high brightness of 12000 lumens, it performs exceptionally well outdoors, providing a clear and bright picture suitable for various occasions, especially outdoor movie nights. The native resolution of 1080P ensures clarity and color reproduction for a powerful home theater tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute mini projector
reviews.reviewText: I got it for my daughter, and oh boy, she's all over it. She's usually pretty independent, and with this projector, she didn't even need my help to set it up. The picture quality is impressive. It's clear that we aren't squinting to see the details, and the colors pop just right, making everything look lively. Not to mention, the brightness is just on point. It's bright enough to enjoy without straining our eyes, which is crucial for those long movie marathons. This little gadget has added a nice touch to our family movie nights. It's simple, effective, and just does what it's supposed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It's a compact projector with Bluetooth, perfect for transforming our living room into a mini cinema. The setup was straightforward, and can be connecting it to my phone via Bluetooth. We watched "Finding Nemo," and the colors popped, making the underwater scenes come alive. We've used it for a couple of educational videos, and it worked like a charm. The sound quality is decent, but for the full effect, I pair it with our external speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size and function both hit the target
reviews.reviewText: Order arrived as description promised in the product info. I'd say it's Perfectly sized and fits just as I expected. The size is not too big nor too tiny for my kids' little hands; it functions well, the material is good enough not slippery with good grips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product. When I received it, I have was pleasantly surprised by the quality. It's lightweight so it's easy to carry around on the go. When you go on a field trip, you can use it to watch a movie at night. Its Bluetooth connection is fast and stable. Its auto focus is very good and it plays very clearly no matter where it is placed. The picture it plays is very clear and the sound quality is very good. In addition, it has fast internal circulation heat dissipation, effectively blocking dust, and has a long service life. It has a small body and does not take up too much space. It is highly recommended to buy this product.
